Changes for ks.channelsmtp

-------------------

- Fixes in code tabulation

-------------------

- Fixes in code tabulation

- Added valid sending to BCC addresses

-------------------

- BCC field added

0.1.0 (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial code commit
